ygData.subject: RE: Another what would you do in this situation story ( very long)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was too busy trying to escape to pay attention to what they were doing. Apparently I didn t get everything on my trail and they got attacked before they
ygData.messageBody:
I was too busy trying to escape to pay attention to what they were doing.
Apparently I didn't get everything on my trail and they got attacked before
they could get to their corpse. They ended up zoning to escape dying a
second time. Because it was easy for me to retrieve my corpse (near
Runnyeye zone), I ended up trying (and dying) a second time to get their
corpses.

BTW, the main reason I died the first time is because I had a DOT cast on
me. As I was running to the zone, my health dropped low enough to slow me
down. I was weaving Selos, Hymn, and the 22d level song (and even equipped
lute while running) . Sure would have been nice if the 22d song had gotten
rid of the DOTs because I probably would have survived.

Galtin of E'ci

> Also, if you made it to 5 feet from the border, how come the other guys
> couldn't get to their
> corpses?
